1PN22M1 Sight for BMP-1(East german, soviet and sweden)

I will not make the 1PN22M2 with HE scale bacause the snail messed the HE shell up so it has not even close the realistic trajectory.

Have fun with the sight and leave a comment if you like it.

Прицел с Широко и Широко Террор из игры Синий архив

No. 16 - High Velocity Gunsight - Sniper

Sup guys 😎
Back with another usersight I've made after spotting a fancy reticle online that may be useful as a WT usersight

Description: A sight with a chevron reticle with two movable lines, a movable center line and a dot that tell you the elevation of your gun barrel.

Bonus drawing: Russian rock band Sektor Gaza, requested by @KohleR. WTdraw files inside.

Best used when: Your tank has a high velocity round, preferably for top tier tanks with APFSDS and a Laser rangefinder.

#wtdraw #sight #sights #u...
